content: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Update LargeResponseConfig to use String instead of &'a str for file_prefix
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating LargeResponseConfig
Remove lifetime parameter 'a from FormatterConfig struct
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing FormatterConfig lifetime
Remove lifetime parameter 'a from ResponseFormatter struct
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing ResponseFormatter lifetime
Remove lifetime parameter 'a from ResponseFormatterFactory struct
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing ResponseFormatterFactory lifetime
Remove lifetime parameter 'a from ResponseFormatterBuilder struct
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing ResponseFormatterBuilder lifetime
Update all factory methods to use String::from() or .to_string() for file_prefix
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating factory methods
Run cargo clippy after completing lifetime simplification
Fix any clippy issues following our rules
Create ResponseFormatterFactory::standard() method with common configuration
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding standard() method
Update entity_operation to delegate to standard() method
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating entity_operation
Update resource_operation to delegate to standard() method
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating resource_operation
Update list_operation to delegate to standard() method
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating list_operation
Run cargo clippy after completing factory consolidation
Fix any clippy issues following our rules
Create LocalResponseFormatter struct in support/response.rs or new module
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating LocalResponseFormatter
Implement LocalResponseFormatter methods with automatic large response handling
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after implementing LocalResponseFormatter
Migrate list_logs handler to use LocalResponseFormatter
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating list_logs
Run cargo clippy after completing local handler unification
Fix any clippy issues following our rules
Identify simple response cases suitable for Response API migration
Migrate get_trace_log_path to use Response::success()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating get_trace_log_path
Migrate cleanup_logs success responses to use Response API
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating cleanup_logs
Run cargo clippy after completing Response API adoption
Fix any clippy issues following our rules
Extract large response handling logic from format_success into separate method
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after extracting method
Refactor format_success to use the extracted method with reduced nesting
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after refactoring format_success
Run cargo clippy after completing logic simplification
Fix any clippy issues following our rules
Add module-level documentation explaining Response vs ResponseBuilder vs ResponseFormatter
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding documentation
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a subagent to do code review focusing on duplication, complexity, and plan validation
Review subagent's suggested changes with the user
